title: File your company accounts and tax return

details.description: File a limited company's annual accounts with Companies House and the Company Tax Return with HMRC
details.more_information:
To file both your Company Tax Return and annual accounts you need:

- [Government Gateway](https://www.gov.uk/government-gateway "Government Gateway") user ID and password - you use this to login to HMRC's online services
- your company accounts
- your Corporation Tax calculations
- Companies House password and authentication code

To get a Companies House password and authentication code, [register online.](https://ewf.companieshouse.gov.uk/runpage?page=webfilingRegister&signUpPage.lang=en "Register for Companies House WebFiling"){:rel="external"} They will send you a password by email, and the authentication code by post to your registered office address.

##Who can use this service
You can file your annual accounts with Companies House using this service if you have a private limited [company that doesn't need an auditor.](/running-a-limited-company "Audit exemption for private limited companies")

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
details.introduction: File your Company Tax Return with HM Revenue & Customs and your annual accounts with Companies House.
